kpi_info.title: Voice pag att per LAC
kpi_info.use: The counter is updated when MSC sends first Paging message on A-interface and the reason of the paging is mobile terminated voice call. The repagings are not counted. There are certain cases (ie. single numbering scheme) when the call type (speech or data call) cannot be determined during the paging process. These pagings are considered as voice paging regarding this counter.Doesn't contain the cases when the paging result is subscriber busy.
